metadata.description: RAPTOR Security Framework - Autonomous offensive and defensive research tools for Claude Code

plugins.name: raptor-scan
plugins.description: RAPTOR Code Security Scan - Static analysis with Semgrep for vulnerability detection

plugins.name: raptor-fuzz
plugins.description: RAPTOR Binary Fuzzer - AFL++ orchestration for crash discovery and exploit generation

plugins.name: raptor-web
plugins.description: RAPTOR Web Application Scanner - OWASP Top 10 vulnerability detection

plugins.name: raptor-agentic
plugins.description: RAPTOR Full Autonomous Workflow - Semgrep + CodeQL + LLM analysis with exploit/patch generation

plugins.name: raptor-codeql
plugins.description: RAPTOR CodeQL Analysis - Deep semantic code analysis with dataflow tracking

plugins.name: raptor-analyze
plugins.description: RAPTOR LLM Analysis - AI-powered vulnerability analysis on existing SARIF files

plugins.name: raptor-crash-analysis
plugins.description: RAPTOR Crash Analysis - Autonomous root-cause analysis for C/C++ crashes using rr, ASAN, and coverage

plugins.name: raptor-oss-forensics
plugins.description: RAPTOR OSS Forensics - GitHub forensic investigation with GH Archive, Wayback Machine, and git analysis

plugins.name: raptor-exploit
plugins.description: RAPTOR Exploit Generator - Generate proof-of-concept exploits (beta)

plugins.name: raptor-patch
plugins.description: RAPTOR Patch Generator - Generate secure patches for vulnerabilities (beta)
